```{r}
# Set seed
set.seed(123)

# Create a 5x10 matrix of random integers
random_matrix <- matrix(sample(1:100, 50, replace = TRUE), nrow = 5, ncol = 10, 
                        dimnames = list(c("gene1", "gene2", "gene3", "gene4", "gene5"), c("cond1", "cond2", "cond3", "cond4", "cond5", "ctrl1", "ctrl2", "ctrl3", "ctrl4", "ctrl5")))

random_matrix

# Calculate mean of condition columns and control columns
mean_cond <- colMeans(random_matrix[,1:5])
mean_cntrl <- colMeans(random_matrix[,6:10])

# Calculate fold change by dividing condition averages by control averages
fold_change <- mean_cond/mean_cntrl
fold_change
```
